```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Read in the differential expression results

```{r}
library(here)
library(data.table)


de <- fread("../../results/combined/data-files/de.tsv")
sig_tet_contrasts <- de[feature_id %like% "TET" & FDR < 0.1, contrast]
```

## Filter for the TET

```{r}
sig_tet <- de[contrast %chin% sig_tet_contrasts]

fwrite(sig_tet, "../../results/shoghag/data-files/TET-de-results.tsv.gz", sep = "\t", compress = TRUE)
```
